  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_106589</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_106589</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Plane wave propagation towards a barrier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flache Welle Ausbreitung in Richtung zu einer 
Sperre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propagation d'onde plane vers une barrière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Propagação da onda plana para uma barreira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Propagazione dell'onda piana verso una barriera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάδοση επίπεδων κυμάτων προς ένα εμπόδιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Propagación de la onda plana hacia una barrera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show plane waves moving towards a barrier that is at an angle with the wave (top) and a barrier with a narrow gap (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">barrier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">narrow gap</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plane waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wave propagation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen die flachen Wellen, die 
in Richtung zu einer Sperre bewegen, die schräg mit der Welle 
(Oberseite) und einer Sperre mit einem schmalen Abstand (Unterseite) 
ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent les ondes planes se 
déplaçant vers une barrière qui est sous un angle avec la vague 
(dessus) et une barrière avec un intervalle étroit (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram as ondas planas que 
movem-se para uma barreira que esteja em um ângulo com a onda (alto) 
e em uma barreira com uma abertura estreita (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano le onde piane che 
si muovono verso una barriera che è ad angolo con l'onda (parte 
superiore) e una barriera con uno spacco stretto (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν επίπεδα κύματα που 
κινούνται προς ένα εμπόδιο που είναι διαγωνίως με το κύμα 
(κορυφή) και ένα εμπόδιο με ένα στενό χάσμα (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran las ondas planas que
se mueven hacia una barrera que esté en ángulo con la onda (tapa) y 
una barrera con un boquete estrecho (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sperre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schmaler Abstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">flache Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welle Ausbreitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">barrière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">intervalle étroit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ondes planes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">propagation de vague</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">barreira</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">abertura estreita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas planas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">propagação da onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">barriera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spacco stretto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onde piane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">propagazione dell'onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εμπόδιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στενό χάσμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επίπεδα κύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάδοση κυμάτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">barrera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">boquete estrecho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ondas planas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">propagación de la onda</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
